title: How to Get a Strombonin in My Singing Monsters in 5 Easy Steps

steps.title: Obtain some parent monsters.
steps.content: Obtain some parent monsters. The best parents to breed a Strombonin are a Spunge and a Bowgart . [1] X Research source This is also the best combination if you're trying to breed a Rare Strombonin unless you already have a Strombonin. [2] X Research source Note that this combo can also breed a Rare Spunge, Rare Bowgart, Rare Potbelly, or Rare Toe Jammer. If you're just trying to get a regular Strombonin, make sure to breed outside of a Rare breeding window.

steps.title: Level the parents to level 4.
steps.content: Level the parents to level 4. Monsters must be at least level 4 to breed, so level up your parent monsters if they're not already at least level 4. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Upgrade your Breeding Structures if you wish.
steps.content: Upgrade your Breeding Structures if you wish. While not necessary, you can upgrade your Breeding Structures to reduce breeding times by 25%. You can upgrade your structure by spending 25 diamonds. You can also add Wishing Torches around your Breeding Structure to help increase the odds of a rare monster being bred. [4] X Research source Wishing Torches can be lit for 24 hours by paying 2 diamonds or be lit permanently by paying 100 diamonds.

steps.title: Breed the parent monsters on Cold Island.
steps.content: Breed the parent monsters on Cold Island. Once you're ready to breed your monsters, put them in the Breeding Structure. A Strombonin egg is turquoise with blue scales and pink shells on it, similar in aesthetic to a Strombonin. [5] X Research source To get a Rare Strombonin, you'll need to wait until a breeding window opens up. There are some promotions and events where all Rares of a certain element are available. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for your Strombonin to hatch.
steps.content: Wait for your Strombonin to hatch. By default, a Strombonin egg takes 23 hours to hatch. However, if you've got enhanced Breeding Structures, it will hatch in 17 hours and 15 minutes.
